title: Strengthening Software Development Practical Competencies: Adaptive Hypermedia-Based Personalized Mathematics Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners will be able to solve math problems tailored to their individual levels with 80% accuracy in an adaptive system based on IMS LD standards.
Learners can identify three or more causes of errors and develop corrective strategies through analysis of system-provided feedback.
Learners can improve their goal achievement rate by 20% within a week using the learning path adjustment feature.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
